description: indigo-dyed bedcover; vertical lines of white circles, alternating with thin, squiggly lines made up of small, white circles

title: Bedding cover (futonji) with pot pot (tsubo-tsubo) and rising steam (tatewaku) motifs made in the Tōhoku Region
